Title: 1. Гражданин Кейн
Description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

Title: 2. Крестный отец
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: 3. 12 разгневанных мужчин
Description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

Title: 4. Касабланка
Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

Title: 5. Страсти Жанны д'Арк
Description: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.

Title: 6. Огни большого города
Description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Title: 7. Головокружение
Description: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

Title: 8. Семь самураев
Description: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, and he gathers six other samurai to join him.

Title: 9. Восход солнца
Description: A sophisticated city woman seduces a farmer and convinces him to murder his wife and join her in the city, but he ends up rekindling his romance with his wife when he changes his mind at the last moment.

Title: 10. Крестный отец 2
Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: 11. Эта замечательная жизнь
Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Title: 12. Окно во двор
Description: A bored photographer recovering from a broken leg passes the time by watching his neighbors and begins to suspect one of them of murder.

Title: 13. Психо
Description: A secretary on the run for embezzlement takes refuge at a secluded California motel owned by a repressed man and his overbearing mother.

Title: 14. Метрополис
Description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Title: 15. Сансет бульвар
Description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Title: 16. Человек с киноаппаратом
Description: A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.

Title: 17. Токийская повесть
Description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

Title: 18. Поющие под дождем
Description: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

Title: 19. Квартира
Description: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but office politics and his own romantic hopes complicate matters.

Title: 20. Лоуренс Аравийский
Description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

Title: 21. Доктор Стрейнджлав, или Как я научился не волноваться и полюбил атомную бомбу
Description: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Title: 22. Хороший, плохой, злой
Description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: 23. М убийца
Description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Title: 24. Пролетая над гнездом кукушки
Description: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

Title: 25. Третий человек
Description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

Title: 26. Новые времена
Description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Title: 27. Всё о Еве
Description: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

Title: 28. Рай и ад
Description: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

Title: 29. Броненосец «Потемкин»
Description: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

Title: 30. Двойная страховка
Description: An insurance representative is seduced by a dissatisfied housewife into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, a claims investigator.

Title: 31. Апокалипсис сегодня
Description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: 32. Расёмон
Description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

Title: 33. Волшебник страны Оз
Description: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.

Title: 34. Правила игры
Description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

Title: 35. Похитители велосипедов
Description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to find work. He and his son set out to find it.

Title: 36. Таксист
Description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Title: 37. Лучшие годы нашей жизни
Description: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

Title: 38. 2001 год: Космическая одиссея
Description: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

Title: 39. Звёздные войны
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: 40. Унесенные ветром
Description: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

Title: 41. В джазе только девушки
Description: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

Title: 42. Восемь с половиной
Description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

Title: 43. Это случилось однажды ночью
Description: A rogue reporter trailing a runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops along the way.

Title: 44. Жить
Description: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Title: 45. На западном фронте без перемен
Description: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

Title: 46. Битва за Алжир
Description: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

Title: 47. Великий диктатор
Description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Title: 48. Шерлок младший
Description: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

Title: 49. В порту
Description: An ex-prize fighter turned New Jersey longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses, including his older brother, as he starts to connect with the grieving sister of one of the syndicate's victims.

Title: 50. Короткая встреча
Description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

Title: 51. Дети райка
Description: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan in 1830s Paris and the four men who love her.

Title: 52. Гроздья гнева
Description: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

Title: 53. На север через северо-запад
Description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

Title: 54. Список Шиндлера
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: 55. Паровоз Генерал
Description: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

Title: 56. Тропы славы
Description: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

Title: 57. Мост через реку Квай
Description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

Title: 58. Управляющий Сансё
Description: In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.

Title: 59. Сокровища Сьерра Мадре
Description: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

Title: 60. Барри Линдон
Description: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

Title: 61. Сладкая жизнь
Description: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

Title: 62. Харакири
Description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

Title: 63. Персона
Description: A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

Title: 64. Поздняя весна
Description: Several people try to talk 27-year-old Noriko into marrying, but all she wants is to keep on caring for her widowed father.

Title: 65. Красные башмачки
Description: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

Title: 66. Энни Холл
Description: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Title: 67. Славные парни
Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Title: 68. Звёздные войны: Эпизод 5 - Империя наносит ответный удар
Description: After the Empire overpowers the Rebel Alliance, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda. At the same time, Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett pursue his friends across the galaxy.

Title: 69. Китайский квартал
Description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

Title: 70. Чeтыреста ударов
Description: A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.

Title: 71. Фанни и Александр
Description: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their lively and affectionate theatrical family, the Ekdahls.

Title: 72. Великая иллюзия
Description: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.

Title: 73. Удел человеческий 3
Description: His ideals challenged by life as a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist faces ever greater tests in his fight for survival.

Title: 74. Седьмая печать
Description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

Title: 75. Ночь охотника
Description: A self-proclaimed preacher marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real dad hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

Title: 76. Дурная слава
Description: The daughter of a convicted German spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of German scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Title: 77. Печать зла
Description: A Mexican official and his American wife are targeted in a Texas border town by the crime family he's trying to put behind bars for drug trafficking, as his concern grows over the tactics of the local detective whose cooperation he needs.

Title: 78. Телохранитель
Description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

Title: 79. Армия теней
Description: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

Title: 80. Шоа
Description: Claude Lanzmann's epic documentary recounts the story of the Holocaust through interviews with witnesses - perpetrators as well as survivors.

Title: 81. Мальтийский сокол
Description: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

Title: 82. Женщина в песках
Description: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

Title: 83. Андрей Рублёв
Description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

Title: 84. Золотая лихорадка
Description: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

Title: 85. Бешеный бык
Description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

Title: 86. Леопард
Description: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860s Sicily.

Title: 87. Бильярдист
Description: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Title: 88. Чужой
Description: After investigating a mysterious transmission of unknown origin, the crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform.

Title: 89. Охотник на оленей
Description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Title: 90. Земляничная поляна
Description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

Title: 91. Плата за страх
Description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

Title: 92. Как зелена была моя долина
Description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

Title: 93. Виридиана
Description: Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.

Title: 94. Время развлечений
Description: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

Title: 95. Собачий полдень
Description: Three amateur robbers plan to hold up a Brooklyn bank. A nice, simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

Title: 96. Иди и смотри
Description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

Title: 97. Летят журавли
Description: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

Title: 98. Дзета
Description: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

Title: 99. Побег из Шоушенка
Description: A banker convicted of uxoricide forms a friendship over a quarter century with a hardened convict, while maintaining his innocence and trying to remain hopeful through simple compassion.

Title: 100. Наполеон
Description: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

Title: 101. Ночи Кабирии
Description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

Title: 102. Вудсток
Description: Oscar-winning musical chronicle that brilliantly captures the three-day rock concert and celebration of peace and love that became a capstone for the Sixties.

Title: 103. Телесеть
Description: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about mass media for its own profit, but finds that his message may be difficult to control.

Title: 104. Приговоренный к смерти бежал, или Дух веет, где хочет
Description: A captured French Resistance fighter during World War II engineers a daunting escape from a German prison in France.

Title: 105. Вестсайдская история
Description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Title: 106. Быть или не быть
Description: During the German occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

Title: 107. Ран
Description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

Title: 108. Молчание ягнят
Description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: 109. Дикая банда
Description: An aging group of outlaws in 1913 Texas look for one last big score, selling stolen Army rifles to a rogue Mexican general during that country's revolution, as the traditional American West is disappearing around them.

Title: 110. Амадей
Description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

Title: 111. Нэшвилл
Description: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

Title: 112. Жизнь и смерть полковника Блимпа
Description: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

Title: 113. Лестница в небо
Description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

Title: 114. Слово
Description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

Title: 115. Афера
Description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: 116. Заводной апельсин
Description: Alex DeLarge and his droogs barbarize a decaying near-future.

Title: 117. Филадельфийская история
Description: After a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

Title: 118. Индиана Джонс: В поисках утраченного ковчега
Description: In 1936, archaeologists and adventurers of the U.S. government hired Indiana Jones to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis could obtain its extraordinary powers.

Title: 119. Человек, который застрелил Либерти Вэланса
Description: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

Title: 120. Сладкий запах успеха
Description: A powerful Broadway columnist coerces an unscrupulous press agent into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

Title: 121. Челюсти
Description: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

Title: 122. Однажды на Диком Западе
Description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

Title: 123. Убить пересмешника
Description: A widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama defends a black man against a false rape charge while teaching his young children about the sad reality of prejudice.

Title: 124. Полуночный ковбой
Description: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

Title: 125. Искатели
Description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

Title: 126. Невеста Франкенштейна
Description: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Baron Henry Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

Title: 127. Женщина не в себе
Description: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

Title: 128. Сказки туманной луны после дождя
Description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

Title: 129. Рио Браво
Description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

Title: 130. Уступи место завтрашнему дню
Description: An elderly couple are forced to live hundreds of miles apart when they lose their house and none of their five children will take both parents in.

Title: 131. Мир Апу
Description: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.

Title: 132. Наудачу, Бальтазар
Description: The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.

Title: 133. Песнь дороги
Description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

Title: 134. Дилижанс
Description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

Title: 135. Умберто Д.
Description: An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.

Title: 136. Криминальное чтиво
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: 137. Аталанта
Description: Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.

Title: 138. Анатомия убийства
Description: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

Title: 139. Выпускник
Description: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

Title: 140. Воспитание крошки
Description: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

Title: 141. Магазинчик за углом
Description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

Title: 142. Утиный суп
Description: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

Title: 143. Разговор
Description: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

Title: 144. Сияние
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence. At the same time, his psychic son sees horrifying forebodings from both the past and the future.

Title: 145. Трамвай «Желание»
Description: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

Title: 146. Алчность
Description: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

Title: 147. Дни жатвы
Description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

Title: 148. Рим, открытый город
Description: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

Title: 149. Французский связной
Description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

Title: 150. Кинг Конг
Description: A film crew goes to a tropical island for a location shoot, where they capture a colossal ape who takes a shine to their blonde starlet, and bring him back to New York City.

Title: 151. Удел человеческий
Description: A Japanese pacifist, unable to face the dire consequences of conscientious objection, is transformed by his attempts to compromise with the demands of war-time Japan.

Title: 152. Неприятности в раю
Description: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

Title: 153. Сталкер
Description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

Title: 154. Ребекка
Description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

Title: 155. Жанна Дильман, набережная коммерции 23, Брюссель 1080
Description: A lonely widowed housewife does her daily chores, takes care of her apartment where she lives with her teenage son, and turns the occasional trick to make ends meet. However, something happens that changes her safe routine.

Title: 156. Непрощенный
Description: Retired Old West gunslinger Will Munny reluctantly takes on one last job to avenge an injustice with the help of his old partner and a newer outlaw known simply as The Schofield Kid.

Title: 157. Тонкий человек
Description: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

Title: 158. Леди Ева
Description: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

Title: 159. Рокко и его братья
Description: Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.

Title: 160. Дорога

Description: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

Title: 187. Властелин колец: Возвращение короля
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Description: A series of eight famous pieces of classical music, conducted by Leopold Stokowski and interpreted in animation by Walt Disney's team of artists.

Description: Two Soviet partisans on a mission to gather food contend with the winter cold, the occupying Germans, and their own psyches.

Description: An American dancer comes to Britain and falls for a model whom he initially annoyed, but she mistakes him for his goofy producer.

Description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

Title: 211. Непокоренный
Description: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

Title: 212. Могила светлячков
Description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Title: 213. На последнем дыхании
Description: A small-time crook, hunted by the authorities for a car theft and the murder of a police officer, attempts to persuade a hip American journalism student to run away with him to Italy.

Title: 214. Буч Кэссиди и Сандэнс Кид
Description: In 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid lead a band of outlaws. When a train robbery goes wrong, they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels..

Title: 215. Глубокий сон
Description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail--and what might be love.

Title: 216. Делай как надо
Description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

Title: 217. Американская ночь
Description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

Title: 218. Тень сомнения
Description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

Title: 219. Унесённые призраками
Description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: 220. Я - Куба
Description: Four vignettes about the lives of the Cuban people set during the pre-revolutionary era.

Title: 221. Толпа
Description: The life of a man and woman together in a large, impersonal metropolis through their hopes, struggles, and downfalls.

Title: 222. Жюль и Джим

Title: 223. Яркий летний день
Description: Based on a true story, primarily on a conflict between two youth gangs, a 14-year-old boy's girlfriend conflicts with the head of one gang for an unclear reason, until finally the conflict comes to a violent climax.

Title: 224. Властелин колец: Братство кольца
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: 225. Человек-слон
Description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.

Title: 227. Ангел-истребитель
Description: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

Title: 228. Мистер Смит едет в Вашингтон
Description: A naive youth leader is appointed to fill a vacancy in the U.S. Senate. His idealistic plans promptly collide with corruption at home and subterfuge from his hero in Washington, but he tries to forge ahead despite attacks on his character.

Description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

Title: 230. Моя дорогая Клементина
Description: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

Title: 231. Дерсу Узала
Description: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

Title: 232. Взвод
Description: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Title: 233. Незнакомцы в поезде
Description: A psychopath tries to forcibly persuade a tennis star to agree to his theory that two strangers can get away with murder by submitting to his plan to kill the other's most-hated person.

Title: 234. Три цвета: Красный
Description: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

Title: 235. Марти
Description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

Title: 236. Кабаре
Description: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

Title: 237. Скромное обаяние буржуазии
Description: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.

Title: 238. Белоснежка и семь гномов
Description: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

Title: 239. Амаркорд
Description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

Title: 240. Трон в крови
Description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

Title: 241. Потерянный уик-энд
Description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

Title: 242. Отныне и во веки веков
Description: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a pugilistic private is cruelly punished for refusing to join his unit's boxing team. Meanwhile, his commanding officer's wife and top NCO are indulging in a torrid love affair.

Title: 243. Обет
Description: A simple yet devout Christian makes a vow to Saint Barbara after she saves his donkey, but everyone he meets seems determined to misunderstand his intentions. Will he be able to keep his promise in the end?

Title: 244. Чёрный нарцисс
Description: A group of nuns struggle to establish a convent in the Himalayas, while isolation, extreme weather, altitude, and culture clashes all conspire to drive the well-intentioned missionaries mad.

Description: Follows a woman's fight and survival amid the vicissitudes of life and the cruelty of society.

Description: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th-century Denmark.

Description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from quitting and remarrying, using an exclusive interview with a death row convict as an enticement to buy himself some time to win her back.

Title: 250. Добрые сердца и короны

Title: 253. Миссис Минивер
Description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

Description: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

Title: 255. Красная река
Description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

Title: 256. Подводная лодка
Description: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

Description: Two shoeshine boys in postwar Rome, Italy save up to buy a horse, but their involvement as dupes in a burglary lands them in juvenile prison; the experience take a devastating toll on their friendship.

Description: When a mysterious entity possesses a young girl, her mother seeks the help of two Catholic priests to save her life.

Description: A carpenter in the Fascist Slovak State is appointed "Aryan controller" of a Jewish widow's store.

Title: 263. Хиросима, моя любовь
Description: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

Title: 264. Человек на все времена
Description: The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

Title: 265. В случае убийства набирайте «М»
Description: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

Title: 266. Пустоши
Description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town, and her older greaser boyfriend, embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota Badlands.

Description: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.

Title: 273. Наследница

Description: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

Description: Crook Johnny Clay assembles a five-man team to plan and execute a daring racetrack robbery.

Description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

Title: 279. Крамер против Крамера
Description: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

Title: 280. Родиться-то я родился, но...
Description: Two young brothers throw a tantrum when they discover that their father isn't the most important man in his workplace.

Title: 281. Агирре, гнев божий
Description: In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.

Title: 282. Странствия Салливана
Description: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

Title: 283. Форрест Гамп
Description: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

Title: 284. Мадам де...
Description: When an aristocratic woman known only as "Madame de . . ." sells a pair of earrings given to her by her husband in order to pay some debts, she sets off a chain reaction of financial and carnal consequences that can end only in despair.

Title: 285. Слуга
Description: Upper-class Tony hires servant Hugo Barrett, who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

Title: 286. Лора
Description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

Title: 287. Раннее лето
Description: A family chooses a match for their daughter Noriko, but she, surprisingly, has her own plans.

Title: 288. Нетерпимость
Description: Four historical tales depict the ongoing human struggle against prejudice and inhumanity.

Title: 289. Ганди
Description: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

Title: 290. Кагемуся: Тень воина
Description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

Title: 291. Тихий человек
Description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in 1920s Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

Title: 292. В укромном месте

Title: 294. Милдред Пирс
Description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

Title: 295. Встреть меня в Сент-Луисе
Description: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

Title: 296. Кес
Description: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

Title: 297. Округ Харлан, США

Title: 298. Иваново детство

Title: 299. Страх съедает душу
Description: A lonely widow meets a much younger Moroccan worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.

Title: 300. Белая горячка
Description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

Title: 301. Подними красный фонарь

Title: 302. Я - беглый каторжник
Description: A World War I veteran and aspiring engineer tries to re-enter civilian life. After being unwillingly caught up in a robbery, he suffers the intolerable conditions of a Southern chain gang, struggling to clear his name and prove his worth.

Title: 303. The Beatles: Вечер трудного дня
Description: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

Title: 304. Красный круг
Description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

Title: 305. Дух улья
Description: In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Франкенштейн (1931), a sensitive seven-year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.

Title: 306. Шейн
Description: An ex-gunfighter defends homesteaders in 1889 Wyoming.

Title: 307. Новый кинотеатр «Парадизо»
Description: Salvatore, a famous film director, returns to his hometown for the funeral of the local theater's film projectionist, Alfredo. He reminisces about his life as a young boy falling in love with cinema.

Title: 308. Мамочка и шлюха
Description: The chauvinist Alexandre balances relationships with several women in the post-1968 intellectual scene of Paris.

Title: 309. Сцены из супружеской жизни
Description: Chronicles the many years of love and turmoil that bind Marianne and Johan through matrimony, infidelity, divorce, and subsequent partners.

Title: 310. Девичий источник
Description: In 14th-century Sweden, an innocent yet pampered teenage girl and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out from their farm to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

Title: 311. Нюрнбергский процесс
Description: Fictionalized depiction of the 1947 Judges' Trial, the third of twelve trials of Nazi war criminals conducted by the American occupying forces in Nuremberg, Germany, in which former judges of Nazi Germany were tried for their actions.

Title: 312. Пианист
Description: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family. As the situation worsens, he hides in the ruins of Warsaw in order to survive.

Title: 313. Гамлет
Description: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.

Title: 314. Дерево для башмаков
Description: Peasant life in a feudal farm in rural Italy at the end of the 19th century.

Title: 315. Иметь и не иметь
Description: During World War II, an American expatriate helps transport a French Resistance leader and his wife to Martinique while romancing a lounge singer.

Title: 316. Прощай, моя наложница
Description: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

Title: 317. Мой дядюшка
Description: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

Title: 318. Следствие по делу гражданина вне всяких подозрений
Description: A high-ranking police inspector murders his mistress and - in a sardonic test to prove that he is above suspicion - deliberately plants clues that indicate his responsibility for the crime.

Title: 319. Бедные-несчастные
Description: An account of the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

Title: 320. Ветер
Description: A frail young woman from the East moves in with her cousin in the West, where she causes tension within the family and is slowly driven mad.

Title: 321. Орфей
Description: A poet in love with Death follows his unhappy wife into the underworld.

Title: 322. Туз в рукаве
Description: Frustrated former journalist Chuck Tatum now working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about trading post owner Leo Minosa trapped in a cave to rekindle Chuck's career, but the story soon escalates into a media circus.

Title: 323. Париж горит
Description: A chronicle of New York's drag scene in the 1980s, focusing on balls, voguing and the ambitions and dreams of those who gave the era its warmth and vitality.

Title: 324. Эдвард Мунк
Description: This biopic of Norwegian Expressionist painter Edvard Munch focuses on the influences that shaped his art, his devastating affair with a married woman that will haunt him for the rest of his life

Title: 325. Барака
Description: A collection of expertly photographed scenes of human life and religion.

Title: 326. Франкенштейн
Description: Dr Henry Frankenstein is obsessed with assembling a living being from parts of several exhumed corpses.

Title: 327. Уродцы
Description: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist Cleopatra agrees to marry Hans the leader of side-show performers, but Hans' deformed friends discover that she is only marrying him for his inheritance. So they seek revenge.

Title: 328. Ящик Пандоры
Description: The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.

Title: 329. Ночь у Мод
Description: A devout Catholic man's rigid principles are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.

Title: 330. Американец в Париже
Description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

Title: 331. Необычный день
Description: Two neighbors, a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife, meet during Hitler's visit to Italy in May 1938.

Title: 332. Хладнокровно
Description: Two ex-cons murder a family in a robbery attempt, before going on the run from the authorities. The police try to piece together the details of the murder in an attempt to track down the killers.

Title: 333. Наконец в безопасности!
Description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

Title: 334. Дневник сельского священника
Description: A young priest taking over the parish at Ambricourt tries to fulfill his duties even as he fights a mysterious stomach ailment.

Title: 335. Мужчина и женщина
Description: A widow and a widower find their relationship developing into love, but their past tragedies prove hard to overcome, causing them to proceed with utmost delicacy.

Title: 336. Любовное настроение
Description: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

Title: 337. Долгое прощание
Description: Private eye Philip Marlowe helps friend Terry Lennox out of a jam and is implicated in his wife Sylvia's murder. He also is hired by Eileen Wade to locate her dipsomaniac husband Roger, who frequently disappears when he wants to dry out.

Title: 338. Терминатор 2: Судный день
Description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: 339. Повесть о поздней хризантеме
Description: The adopted son of a legendary actor, and an aspiring star himself, turns to his infant brother's wet nurse for support and affection - only for her to give up everything for her beloved's glory.

Title: 340. Жить своей жизнью
Description: Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.

Title: 341. Огни рампы
Description: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

Title: 342. Эмигранты
Description: Småland, Sweden, mid-19th century. A farming family struggle with their rocky, unyielding land, and decide to embark on the arduous journey to new hope in America.

Title: 343. Имитация жизни
Description: An aspiring white actress takes in an African American widow whose mixed-race daughter is desperate to be seen as white.

Title: 344. Спартак
Description: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

Title: 345. Фарго
Description: Minnesota car salesman Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Title: 346. Жажда
Description: Vijay, a talented but indigent poet, struggles for love and recognition in this selfish world.

Title: 347. Десять заповедей
Description: Moses, raised as a prince of Egypt in the Pharaoh's household, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people from slavery.

Title: 348. Вакантное место
Description: Bursting with big dreams and plans, an Italian teen goes to Milan to work in a big impersonal corporate office, where he becomes disillusioned and drained of all his individualism.

Title: 349. Дневная красавица
Description: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

Title: 350. Письмо незнакомки
Description: A pianist about to flee from a duel receives a letter from a woman he cannot remember, who may hold the key to his downfall.

Title: 351. Ниночка
Description: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

Title: 352. Мистер Дидс переезжает в город
Description: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

Title: 353. Возмутительный класс
Description: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

Title: 354. Бонни и Клайд
Description: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

Title: 355. Близкие контакты третьей степени
Description: Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.

Title: 356. Красота по-американски
Description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

Title: 357. Фицкарральдо
Description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

Title: 358. 39 ступеней
Description: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

Title: 359. Крадущийся тигр, затаившийся дракон
Description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

Title: 360. Доброе утро!
Description: Two boys begin a silence strike to press their parents into buying them a television set.

Title: 361. Нечто
Description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

Title: 362. Последний вальс
Description: A film account and presentation of the final concert of The Band.

Title: 363. Три цвета: Синий
Description: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

Title: 364. Шанхайский экспресс
Description: A notorious woman rides a train through a dangerous situation with a British captain she loved.

Title: 365. Чарулота
Description: The lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her love for literature.

Title: 366. Макарио
Description: Poor and hungry peasant Macario wishes to have a good meal for All Saint's Day. After his wife cooks him a turkey he has three apparitions: The Devil, God, and the Death.

Title: 367. Театральный фургон
Description: An aging movie star uncertain of his future teams up with a top ballerina to headline a new Broadway musical, but the pretentiously artistic goals of its director threaten to change it beyond recognition.

Title: 368. Прошлые жизни
Description: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrested apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Twenty years later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

Title: 369. Мэри Поппинс
Description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

Title: 370. Пианино
Description: In the mid-19th century a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a farmer, but is soon lusted after by a farm worker.

Title: 371. Токийские сумерки
Description: Two sisters find out the existence of their long-lost mother, but the younger cannot take the truth of being abandoned as a child.

Title: 372. Профессия: Репортер
Description: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

Title: 373. Большой город
Description: Life at home changes when a house-wife from a middle-class, conservative family in Calcutta gets a job as a saleswoman.

Title: 374. Большие надежды
Description: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

Title: 375. Манхэттен
Description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

Title: 376. Иван Грозный
Description: During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.

Title: 377. Газовый свет
Description: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the house rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

Title: 378. История игрушек
Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

Title: 379. Мой слуга Годфри
Description: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

Title: 380. Зона интересов
Description: Auschwitz commandant Rudolf Höss and his wife Hedwig strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden beside the camp.

Title: 381. Нефть
Description: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

Title: 382. Приключения Робин Гуда
Description: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

Title: 383. Карманник
Description: Michel passes the time by picking pockets, careful to never be caught despite being watched by the police. His friend Jacques may suspect, while both men may have their eyes on Jeanne, the pretty neighbor of Michel's ailing mother.

Title: 384. Лицо со шрамом
Description: An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

Title: 385. Кошка на раскаленной крыше
Description: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.

Title: 386. Ненависть
Description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

Title: 387. Дверь на сцену
Description: A chronicle of the ambitions, dreams, and disappointments of aspiring actresses who all live in the same boarding house.

Title: 388. Трое негодяев в скрытой крепости
Description: Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

Title: 389. Похоронная процессия роз
Description: The trials and tribulations of Eddie and other transvestites in Japan.

Title: 390. Голубой ангел
Description: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

Title: 391. Ханна и её сестры
Description: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

Title: 392. Селин и Жюли совсем заврались
Description: A mysteriously linked pair of young women find their daily lives preempted by a strange boudoir melodrama that plays itself out in a hallucinatory parallel reality.

Title: 393. Ночь живых мертвецов
Description: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

Title: 394. Подглядывающий
Description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

Title: 395. Секреты Лос-Анджелеса
Description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: 396. Место под солнцем
Description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

Title: 397. Уходя в отрыв
Description: A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.

Title: 398. Чужие
Description: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Title: 399. Гармонии Веркмейстера
Description: A naive young man witnesses an escalation of violence in his small hometown following the arrival of a mysterious circus attraction.

Title: 400. Общество мёртвых поэтов
Description: Maverick teacher John Keating returns in 1959 to the prestigious New England boys' boarding school where he was once a star student, using poetry to embolden his pupils to new heights of self-expression.

Title: 401. Город Бога
Description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: 402. Старикам тут не место
Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon the aftermath of a drug deal gone wrong and over two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Title: 403. Пиноккио
Description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Title: 404. А теперь не смотри
Description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

Title: 405. Баллада о солдате
Description: Young Russian soldier Alyosha earns a medal, but asks to visit his mother instead. His journey recounts various kinds of love during wartime.

Title: 406. Однажды в Америке
Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Title: 407. На несколько долларов больше
Description: Two bounty killers with similar intentions but different motivations team up to track down a psychotic Mexican outlaw before he and his gang can carry out an audacious bank robbery.

Title: 408. Джонни-гитара
Description: After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.

Title: 409. Музыкальная комната
Description: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.

Title: 410. Евангелие от Матфея
Description: The life of Jesus Christ according to the Gospel of Matthew. Film shows Christ as a Marxist avant-la-lettre and therefore uses half of the text of Matthew.

Title: 411. Будучи там
Description: After the death of his employer forces him out of the only home he's ever known, a simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful tycoon and an insider in Washington politics.

Title: 412. Это - Spinal Tap
Description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

Title: 413. Птицы
Description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

Title: 414. Сильная жара
Description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

Title: 415. Доктор Живаго
Description: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

Title: 416. Крамб
Description: An intimate portrait of controversial cartoonist Robert Crumb and his traumatized family.

Title: 417. Иностранный корреспондент
Description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

Title: 418. Единственный сын
Description: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.

Title: 419. Одуванчик
Description: A truck driver stops at a small family-run noodle shop and decides to help its fledgling business. The story is intertwined with various vignettes about the relationship of love and food.

Title: 420. Что случилось с Бэби Джейн?
Description: A former vaudeville child star torments her paraplegic sister, who eclipsed her as a movie star, in their decaying Hollywood mansion while desperately clinging to hopes of a comeback.

Title: 421. Черный Орфей
Description: A retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth, set during the time of the Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro.

Title: 422. Сжигатель трупов
Description: Set in Central Europe during World War II, a demented cremator believes cremation relieves earthly suffering and sets out to save the world.

Title: 423. Комедианты
Description: Greece, 1939-1952: Fascist, Nazi, and Communist conflict, as seen through the eyes of a family of travelling provincial players.

Title: 424. Распутная императрица
Description: A German noblewoman enters into a loveless marriage with the dim-witted, unstable heir to the Russian throne, then plots to oust him from power.

Title: 425. Забойщик овец
Description: Set in the Watts area of Los Angeles, a slaughterhouse worker must suspend his emotions to continue working at a job he finds repugnant, and then he finds he has little sensitivity for the family he works so hard to support.

Title: 426. Маленькие лисички
Description: The ruthless, moneyed Hubbard clan lives in, and poisons, their part of the Deep South at the turn of the twentieth century.

Title: 427. Развод Надера и Симин
Description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

Title: 428. Король Лев
Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: 429. Бунтарь без причины
Description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

Title: 430. Бешеные псы
Description: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: 431. Бумажная луна
Description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

Title: 432. Молодой мистер Линкольн
Description: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest court case.

Title: 433. До свидания, дети
Description: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.

Title: 434. Асфальтовые джунгли
Description: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

Title: 435. Нибелунги: Месть Кримхильды
Description: Princess Kriemhild vows to avenge her husband's murder but must overcome her brothers who swore allegiance to Hagen. She marries Etzel, King of the Huns, and persuades his army to attack Hagen, but she loses more than she bargained for.

Title: 436. Мой сосед Тоторо
Description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

Title: 437. Пишоте: Закон самого слабого
Description: The life of a boy on the streets of Sao Paulo, involved with crimes, prostitution, and drugs.

Title: 438. Любовь
Description: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

Title: 439. Лагерь для военнопленных No17
Description: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

Title: 440. Пепе ле Моко
Description: A wanted gangster is both king and prisoner of the Casbah. He is protected from arrest by his friends, but is torn by his desire for freedom outside. A visiting Parisian beauty may just tempt his fate.

Title: 441. Запрещённые игры
Description: A young French girl orphaned in a German air attack is befriended by the son of a poor farmer, and together they try to come to terms with the realities of death.

Title: 442. Американские граффити
Description: A group of teenagers in California's central valley spend one final night after their 1962 high school graduation cruising the strip with their buddies before they pursue their varying goals.

Title: 443. Во имя отца
Description: An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

Title: 444. Бразилия
Description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

Title: 445. Земляк
Description: American military personnel interact warily with a variety of Italian locals over a year and a half in the push north during the Italian Campaign of WWII as German forces make their retreat.

Title: 446. О мышах и людях
Description: A mentally disabled giant and his level headed guardian find work at a sadistic cowboy's ranch in depression era America.

Title: 447. Анатомия падения
Description: A woman is suspected of murder after her husband's death; their half-blind son faces a moral dilemma as the main witness.

Title: 448. Отступники
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: 449. Кояанискатси
Description: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot. The footage focuses on the relationship between nature, humanity, and technology.

Title: 450. Серые сады
Description: Meet a mother and daughter, high-society dropouts, reclusive cousins of Jackie O., managing to thrive together amid the decay and disorder of their East Hampton, NY, mansion, making for an eerily ramshackle echo of the American Camelot.

Title: 451. Пепел и алмаз
Description: As World War II and the German occupation ends, the Polish resistance and the Soviet forces turn on each other in an attempt to take over leadership in Communist Poland.

Title: 452. Отважные капитаны
Description: A spoiled brat who falls overboard from a steamship in the 1920s gets picked up by a New England fishing boat, where he's made to earn his keep by joining the crew in their work.

Title: 453. Печаль и жалость
Description: An in-depth exploration of the various reactions by the French people to the Vichy government's acceptance of the German invasion.

Title: 454. Фальшивка
Description: A documentary about fraud and fakery.

Title: 455. Стрелок
Description: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him. He hasn't come looking for trouble, but trouble finds him around every corner.

Title: 456. Янки Дудл Денди
Description: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

Title: 457. Король комедии
Description: Rupert is an aspiring stand-up comedian, who is willing to go the extra mile in his attempt to appear in the late night show hosted by his idol.

Title: 458. Бирманская арфа
Description: A conscience-driven Japanese soldier traumatized by the events of WWII adopts the lifestyle of a Buddhist monk.

Title: 459. Путешествие в Италию
Description: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.

Title: 460. Банда аутсайдеров
Description: Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.

Title: 461. Молчание
Description: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

Title: 462. Чyдо на 34-й улице
Description: After a divorced New York mother hires a nice old man to play Santa Claus at Macy's, she is startled by his claim to be the genuine article. When his sanity is questioned, a lawyer defends him in court by arguing that he's not mistaken.

Title: 463. Затмение
Description: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

Title: 464. Сатанинское танго
Description: On the eve of a large payment, residents of a collapsing collective farm see their plans turn into desolation when they discover that Irimiás, a former co-worker who they thought was dead, is returning to the community.

Title: 465. Поселенцы
Description: A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.

Title: 466. Голдфингер
Description: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

Title: 467. Змеиная яма
Description: Virginia Cunningham can't recall how she landed in an asylum. In flashback, her husband Robert relates their courtship, marriage, and her developing symptoms. She remains in misery as Dr. Mark Kik tries to solve her problem.

Title: 468. Изюминка на солнце
Description: A substantial insurance payment could mean either financial salvation or personal ruin for a poor black family.

Title: 469. Малхолланд Драйв
Description: After a car wreck on Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

Title: 470. Танцующий с волками
Description: A lieutenant assigned to a remote Civil War outpost starts questioning his purpose after making contact with a neighboring Sioux settlement.

Title: 471. Законы улицы
Description: Gritty documentary that looks at the lives of teenagers living on the streets of Seattle.

Title: 472. Рагглз из Ред-Геп
Description: An English valet brought to the American west assimilates into the American way of life.

Title: 473. Слова, написанные на ветру
Description: Alcoholic playboy Kyle Hadley marries the woman secretly loved by his poor but hard-working best friend, who in turn is pursued by Kyle's sister.

Title: 474. Цвет граната
Description: The life of the Armenian poet Sayat-Nova, from childhood to death: his spiritual journey, artistic endeavors, and inner conflicts within the cultural and historical context of Armenia. Hailed as revolutionary by Mikhail Vartanov.

Title: 475. Маркета Лазарова
Description: A grim portrayal of the shift from Paganism to Christianity in medieval central Europe - as a young virgin promised to God is kidnapped and raped by a marauder who her religious father seeks to kill in return.

Title: 476. Гранд Отель
Description: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

Title: 477. Этот смутный объект желания
Description: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

Title: 478. Плавучие травы
Description: The head of a Japanese theatre troupe returns to a small coastal town where he left a son who thinks he is his uncle, and tries to make up for the lost time, but his current mistress grows jealous.

Title: 479. Жертва
Description: A closeted lawyer risks his career to bring a blackmailer to justice.

Title: 480. Лицо со шрамом

Description: Documentary covering Bob Dylan's 1965 tour of England, which includes appearances by Joan Baez and Donovan.

Description: A woman narrates the contemplative writings of a seasoned world traveler, focusing on contemporary Japan.

Title: 500. Повесть Тикамацу

Description: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: 533. Магнолия

Title: 534. Звезда за темной тучей
Description: A selfless young woman (Supriya Choudhury) sacrifices her own happiness for her unappreciative family.

Description: A retired auto manufacturer and his wife take a long-planned European vacation only to find that they want very different things from life.

Description: Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.
